channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 跨国汽车制造商对 2024 年的巴西投下了坚定的信任票，大众汽车、丰田汽车、现代汽车和通用汽车也在最近几周确认将提供大量资金。
item.description:
Multinational carmakers have given a firm vote of confidence in Brazil in 2024, with significant funding also confirmed in recent weeks by Volkswagen, Toyota, Hyundai and General Motors https://t.co/PeKv1RNxqO pic.twitter.com/O1nTcBFvej

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 创业仅九年，PDD 就在零售规模和股票市值方面向全球最大的电子商务集团阿里巴巴发起了冲击
item.description:
After just nine years in business, PDD is now bearing down on the world’s biggest ecommerce group Alibaba, both in terms of retail scale and stock market capitalisation https://t.co/3849RUt2S9 pic.twitter.com/Lp7LuiK3qD

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国的财政事件基本上都是政治性的。英国《金融时报》记者马丁-沃尔夫（Martin Wolf）写道："当大选迫在眉睫时，情况尤其如此。
item.description:
British fiscal events are essentially political. This is particularly true when an election looms, writes the FT’s Martin Wolf https://t.co/vH0XAfaIIm pic.twitter.com/GWKDdJEJuT

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 此举是在接连发生令乘客感到不安的暴力袭击事件之后采取的。最近，一名列车长颈部被砍，一名在地铁站表演的大提琴手遭到袭击，这些事件都促使我们部署了警力。
item.description:
The move comes after a spate of violent attacks that have unnerved commuters. Among the recent incidents that prompted the deployment was the slashing in the neck of a train conductor and an assault on a cellist performing in a subway station https://t.co/N8GRkCSw3P pic.twitter.com/gQUWb6ul6E

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 今天下午，在杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）发布的春季预算案中，100 亿美元的个人减税计划成为焦点，英国财政大臣为即将到来的大选划定了战线。以下是我们新一期的《颠覆时代》时事通讯。 via @ft
item.description:
A $10bn personal tax cut took centre stage in Jeremy Hunt’s spring Budget this afternoon as the UK chancellor drew the battle lines for the forthcoming general election. Here's the new edition of our Disrupted Times newsletter. https://t.co/o73k6rMv6L via @ft

— darrendodd (@darrendodd) March 6, 2024

item.title: 大选在即，英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）面临着为选民带来甜头的压力。看看有哪些主要收获：
item.description:
